DOC.detailed_description: FLAK Instrument : The Femtosecond Laser ( IntraLase Corporation , Irvine , CA ) focusable infrared laser , similar familiar neodymium-yttrium-aluminum-garnet ( YAG ) laser , use short pulse hundred-femtosecond ( 100 X 10-15 second ) duration range . There minimal postoperative inflammation collateral tissue damage . Subjects : We enrol subject 18 year old need keratoplasty base clinical finding . Subjects enrol regardless race gender first come first serve basis . Subjects recruit physician clinic . PKP Subjects : We retrospective chart review subject undergone traditional PKP . FLAK eyes age gender match PKP eye compare visual outcome , wound heal complication .
